title: A security and privacy ethics label for JSON documents
description: Collection of schema definitions for expressing security, privacy and ethics parameters associated with a JSON document.

id.title: Label ID
id.description: A Unique URI that identifies this Label

securityClassification.title: Security classification
securityClassification.description: Security Classification of the JSON document

license.title: License
license.description: A license document that applies to this content, typically indicated by URL.

copyrightHolder.title: Copyright holder
copyrightHolder.description: The party holding the legal copyright to the JSON document.

privacyClassification.title: Privacy Classification
privacyClassification.description: Privacy Classification of the JSON document

provenance.title: Provenance
provenance.description: Describe the Provenance of the JSON document

narrative.title: Narrative for the Provenance
narrative.description: Describes the workflow involved in collecting and filtering (or cleaning) the data. This could be a link to someplace that describes the data provenance. Recommended information includes how the data was collected, from where, by whom, and using what applications/scripts/etc. Is not required; is not repeatable. If unknown, unclear or not applicable write No Assertion.
